Title: Penumbra
Writer: Chelese Belmont (story), Gino Costabile, Shannan Leigh Reeve
Actors: Chelese Belmont, Shannan Leigh Reeve, Challen Cates, Marnie Alton
Plot: The story of two addicts: a sober cop and a cocaine-loving artist, whose past history and addictions cause their lives to intersect. A tragic event will set both of them on a path that will challenge everything that they know and love.
